I see nothing about upgradable buildings in this post, only Harvester asking the kommunity what term he should use for height of an aircraft. Would you please explain what you see about upgradable buildings "[in] between the lines"?
Maximum size of craft being able to built in level x VAB/SPH.

Yes, he talked about UI texts so this is an feature in KSP.

Get used to planes without tail fins but double deck wings.

Makes sense.

I wonder if the most advanced one will still be to a limit, or if it will be unlimited, so lowering through the floor/raising through the roof are still valid construction methods.
He spoke of "UI" so this is probably readouts for the dimensions of a craft, or maybe the dimensions of the next SPH/VAB upgrade.
Vessel size is the obvious thing for building tier to affect, this all but confirms it.
